text: Lycée Eugène-Ionesco is a senior high-school in the commune of Issy-les- Moulineaux, Hauts-de-Seine, in the Paris metropolitan area of France. The school population increased after a 2000s "baby boom" in the area. By 2015 the school had become overcrowded. The school administration, around that time, had fought to keep their Bac Pro programme. () The school's new campus was scheduled to open in 2018, with portable buildings used in the interim. () "le lycée de Boulogne recevra des bâtiments démontables en attendant la construction d'un nouveau lycée, qui n'ouvrira pas avant 2018 ; " ==References== ==External links== * Lycée Eugène-Ionesco Category:Lycées in Hauts-de-Seine
title: Lycée Eugène-Ionesco
